Name: AdministrativeGender
Title: AdministrativeGender
Descriptino: The gender of a person used for administrative purposes.

Name: AllergyIntoleranceCategory
Title: AllergyIntoleranceCategory
Descriptino: Category of an identified substance associated with allergies or intolerances.

Name: AllergyIntoleranceCriticality
Title: AllergyIntoleranceCriticality
Descriptino: Estimate of the potential clinical harm, or seriousness, of a reaction to an identified substance.

Name: AllergyIntoleranceType
Title: AllergyIntoleranceType
Descriptino: Identification of the underlying physiological mechanism for a Reaction Risk.

Name: AllergyIntoleranceClinicalStatusCodes
Title: AllergyIntolerance Clinical Status Codes

Name: AllergyIntoleranceVerificationStatusCodes
Title: AllergyIntolerance Verification Status Codes
Descriptino: Preferred value set for AllergyIntolerance Verification Status.

Name: CarePlanActivityKind
Title: Care Plan Activity Kind
Descriptino: Resource types defined as part of FHIR that can be represented as in-line definitions of a care plan activity.

Name: CarePlanActivityOutcome
Title: Care Plan Activity Outcome
Descriptino: Example codes indicating the outcome of a care plan activity. Note that these are in no way complete and might not even be appropriate for some uses.

Name: CarePlanActivityStatus
Title: CarePlanActivityStatus
Descriptino: Codes that reflect the current state of a care plan activity within its overall life cycle.

Name: CarePlanCategory
Title: Care Plan Category
Descriptino: Example codes indicating the category a care plan falls within.  Note that these are in no way complete and might not even be appropriate for some uses.

Name: CarePlanIntent
Title: Care Plan Intent
Descriptino: Codes indicating the degree of authority/intentionality associated with a care plan.

Name: SNOMEDCTClinicalFindings
Title: SNOMED CT Clinical Findings
Descriptino: This value set includes all the "Clinical finding" [SNOMED CT](http://snomed.info/sct) codes - concepts where concept is-a 404684003 (Clinical finding (finding)).

Name: ConditionCategoryCodes
Title: Condition Category Codes
Descriptino: Preferred value set for Condition Categories.

Name: ConditionClinicalStatusCodes
Title: Condition Clinical Status Codes
Descriptino: Preferred value set for Condition Clinical Status.

Name: ConditionStage
Title: Condition Stage
Descriptino: Example value set for stages of cancer and other conditions.

Name: ConditionStageType
Title: Condition Stage Type
Descriptino: Example value set for the type of stages of cancer and other conditions

Name: ConditionVerificationStatus
Title: ConditionVerificationStatus
Descriptino: The verification status to support or decline the clinical status of the condition or diagnosis.

Name: DaysOfWeek
Title: DaysOfWeek
Descriptino: The days of the week.

Name: CommonLanguages
Title: Common Languages
Descriptino: This value set includes common codes from BCP-47 (http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47)

Name: LinkType
Title: LinkType
Descriptino: The type of link between this patient resource and another patient resource.

Name: Marital Status Codes
Title: MaritalStatus
Descriptino: This value set defines the set of codes that can be used to indicate the marital status of a person.

Name: SNOMEDCTMedicationCodes
Title: SNOMED CT Medication Codes
Descriptino: This value set includes all drug or medicament substance codes and all pharmaceutical/biologic products from SNOMED CT - provided as an exemplar value set.

Name: Medication usage category codes
Title: Medication usage category codes

Title: Medication  status  codes

Name: NameUse
Title: NameUse
Descriptino: The use of a human name.

Name: ProcedurePerformerRoleCodes
Title: Procedure Performer Role Codes
Descriptino: This example value set defines the set of codes that can be used to indicate a role of a procedure performer.

Name: ProcedureCodes(SNOMEDCT)
Title: Procedure Codes (SNOMED CT)
Descriptino: Procedure Code: All SNOMED CT procedure codes.

Name: AllergyIntoleranceSeverity
Title: AllergyIntoleranceSeverity
Descriptino: Clinical assessment of the severity of a reaction event as a whole, potentially considering multiple different manifestations.

Name: SNOMEDCTDrugTherapyStatusCodes
Title: SNOMED CT Drug Therapy Status codes
Descriptino: This value set includes some taken and not taken reason codes from SNOMED CT - provided as an exemplar

Name: RequestPriority
Title: Request priority
Descriptino: The clinical priority of a diagnostic order.

Name: RequestStatus
Title: RequestStatus
Descriptino: Codes identifying the lifecycle stage of a request.

Name: ContactPurpose
Title: Contact Purpose
Descriptino: The purpose for which an associated contact can be reached.

Name: MIMS
Title: MIMS
Descriptino: The MIMS value set includes all values from the Monthly Index of Medical Specialties (MIMS) published by MIMS Australia. Further details can be found at https://www.mims.com.au/.

Name: PBSItemCodes
Title: PBS Item Codes
Descriptino: The PBS Item Codes value set includes all values from Australian Pharmaceutical Benefits Scheme (PBS) schedule published by the Department of Health. Further details can be found at https://www.pbs.gov.au/pbs/.

Name: Hl7VSDegreeLicenseCertificateAUExtended
Title: hl7VS-degreeLicenseCertificate - AU Extended
Descriptino: hl7VS-degreeLicenseCertificate extended for use in an Australian context. Includes HL7 international codes plus Australian additions to create a complete set.

Name: ActSubstanceAdminSubstitutionCode
Title: ActSubstanceAdminSubstitutionCode
Descriptino: ***No description***

Name: GTIN
Title: GTIN
Descriptino: **Description:**Global Trade Item Number is an identifier for trade items developed by GS1 (comprising the former EAN International and Uniform Code Council).

Name: HIDiagnosisCodeVS
Title: Acute Rheumatic Fever and Rheumatic Heart Disease Conditions
Descriptino: Acute Rheumatic Fever and Rheumatic Heart Disease Conditions

Name: HIMedicationCodeVS
Title: Medication Codes for Acute Rheumatic Fever
Descriptino: Medication Codes for Acute Rheumatic Fever

Name: HISeverityVS
Title: Acute Rheumatic Fever Condition Severity
Descriptino: Acute Rheumatic Fever Condition Severity

Name: AdverseReactionAgent
Title: Adverse Reaction Agent
Descriptino: The Adverse Reaction Agent value set includes values that support the recording of agents that may be responsible for causing adverse reactions. It is a broad set encompassing medicinal and non-medicinal agents.

Name: AdverseReactionSubstancesandNegatedFindings
Title: Adverse Reaction Substances and Negated Findings
Descriptino: The Adverse Reaction Substances and Negated Findings value set comprises terms used to identify a predisposition to adverse reactions to substances, as well as negated findings.

Name: AustralianMedication
Title: Australian Medication
Descriptino: The Australian Medication value set includes all Australian Medicines Terminology (AMT) product concepts that may be used for the identification of a medicine, vaccine or other therapeutic good. This is suitable for the recording of a product which may be ordered for, administered to, or used by an individual.

Name: BodySite
Title: Body Site
Descriptino: The Body Site value set includes values that cover a broad range of anatomical and acquired body structures suitable for identifying a body site.

Name: ClinicalFinding
Title: Clinical Finding
Descriptino: The Clinical Finding value set includes a broad range of values that support the recording of disorders and clinical findings, including observations, judgments or assessments about subjects of care.

Name: ClinicalSpecialty
Title: Clinical Specialty
Descriptino: The Clinical Specialty value set includes values that may be used to describe a clinical specialty performed by an entity.

Name: CommonLanguagesInAustralia
Title: Common Languages in Australia
Descriptino: The Common Languages in Australia value set includes languages that are commonly encountered in Australia, including a comprehensive set of Australian Indigenous languages.

Name: ContactRelationshipType
Title: Contact Relationship Type
Descriptino: The Contact Relationship Type value set includes values that may be used to describe the nature of the relationship between the subject and the contact person.

Name: HealthcareOrganisationRoleType
Title: Healthcare Organisation Role Type
Descriptino: The Healthcare Organisation Role Type value set includes values that can represent the role, use or function of a healthcare related organisation or facility.

Name: IndicatorOfHypersensitivityOrIntoleranceToSubstance
Title: Indicator of Hypersensitivity or Intolerance to Substance
Descriptino: The Indicator of Hypersensitivity or Intolerance to Substance value set includes values that may be used to indicate or state a propensity to adverse reaction to a substance. The values represent a range of concept types such as substances, medicines, clinical findings and negated allergy findings.

Name: MedicationReasonTaken
Title: Medication Reason Taken
Descriptino: The Medication Reason Taken value set includes values that identify a reason why a medication has been or is being taken.

Name: MedicineSubstitutionReason
Title: Medicine Substitution Reason
Descriptino: The Medicine Substitution Reason value set includes values that may be used to record the reason for medicine substitution.

Name: PractitionerRole
Title: Practitioner Role
Descriptino: The Practitioner Role value set includes values that describe the role that a practitioner is authorised to perform within an organisation.

Name: ReasonForRequest
Title: Reason for Request
Descriptino: The Reason for Request value set includes values that can be used to indicate the rationale for a request. For example, this may include the reason for requesting a service or diagnostic procedure.

Name: RouteOfAdministration
Title: Route of Administration
Descriptino: The Route of Administration value set includes values that describe the route by which a medicine may be administered.
